events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product is damaged and has visible scratches on the surface.
The case has been categorized as Product Defect due to the customer mentioning damage and scratches.
This case has been assigned to agent Sarah T. for initial follow-up regarding the damaged product.

A satisfaction survey has been sent to your email to gather feedback on your recent support experience.
